description:
A quality Duracell battery to power your favourite small devices

  • Also known as: 5004LB, 5004LC, DL2032, CR2032, BR2032, LM2032, ECR2032
  • Guaranteed for 10 years in storage with Duracell’s Duralock Power Preserve™ Technology
  • Common application: calculators, clocks, watches, lights, bike computers, and cameras
name: Duracell 2032 3V Lithium Single
